plot: Juliette is going to be engaged. During her Hen she imagines to run away on board of a pink limo. One doubt will begin to worm in Juliette mind.
title: Crazy Pink Limo
plot_es: Juliette is going to be engaged. During her Hen she imagines to run away on board of a pink limo. One doubt will begin to worm in Juliette mind.
plot_en: Juliette is going to be engaged. During her Hen she imagines to run away on board of a pink limo. One doubt will begin to worm in Juliette mind.
